\begin{axdef}
	MAX\_ESEL : \nat \\
 MAX\_PID : \nat 
\where
 MAX\_ESEL = 3 \\
 MAX\_PID = 3
\end{axdef}

\begin{zed}
	ESID ::= ES \ldata 1 \upto MAX\_ESEL \rdata
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	PID ::= PD \ldata 1 \upto MAX\_PID \rdata
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	Price == \nat
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	UStatus ::= uok | ufail
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	FStatus ::= fail \ldata ESID \rdata | NA
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	PriceChecker\_State \defs [~  PriceChecker\_dummy : \{ 0 \}  ~]
\end{zed}

\begin{axdef}
	MAX\_GATEWAY : \nat 
\where
 MAX\_GATEWAY = 2
\end{axdef}

\begin{zed}
	GID ::= GW \ldata 1 \upto MAX\_GATEWAY \rdata
\end{zed}

\begin{axdef}
	gwmap : ESID \fun GID 
\where
 gwmap = \{ ( ES~1 , GW~1 ) , ( ES~2 , GW~1 ) , ( ES~3 , GW~2 ) \}
\end{axdef}

	ESEL2\_ES1\_OP\_status \defs [~  \Xi ESEL2\_ES1\_State ; ESEL2\_ES1\_status! : UStatus ; \Xi PriceChecker\_State ; \Xi ESELServer\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW1\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW2\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES3\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES2\_State | ESEL2\_ES1\_status! = ESEL2\_ES1\_status  ~]
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	ESEL2\_ES1\_Init\_fOp \defs [~  \Xi ESEL2\_ES1\_State ; \Xi PriceChecker\_State ; \Xi ESELServer\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW1\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW2\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES3\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES2\_State | \lnot \pre ESEL2\_ES1\_Init  ~]
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	ESEL2\_ES1\_AssgnOp11 \defs [~  \Delta ESEL2\_ES1\_State ; x? : Price ; \Xi PriceChecker\_State ; \Xi ESELServer\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW1\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW2\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES3\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES2\_State | ESEL2\_ES1\_price' = x? \land ESEL2\_ES1\_status' = ESEL2\_ES1\_status  ~]
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	ESEL2\_ES1\_AssgnOp12 \defs [~  \Delta ESEL2\_ES1\_State ; \Xi PriceChecker\_State ; \Xi ESELServer\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW1\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW2\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES3\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES2\_State | ESEL2\_ES1\_status' = uok \land ESEL2\_ES1\_price' = ESEL2\_ES1\_price  ~]
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	ESEL2\_ES1\_AssgnOp13 \defs [~  \Delta ESEL2\_ES1\_State ; \Xi PriceChecker\_State ; \Xi ESELServer\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW1\_State ; \Xi Gateway\_GW2\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES3\_State ; \Xi ESEL2\_ES2\_State | ESEL2\_ES1\_status' = ufail \land ESEL2\_ES1\_price' = ESEL2\_ES1\_price  ~]
\end{zed}
